features: Rhino / Light Mesh Airdry® / Compact Dexfil 40 g
Light wind-breaker combined with an insulating layer lined with thermoregulating mesh Pocket system
Elastic waist with belt loops Windscreen compatible
To complete the kit, the Windscreen lens can be installed on TT helmets for improved aerodynamic performance and, with the smoked lens, to protect from the sun's glare
Reflective logos and accents at front and back for visibility in winters' low daylight
